EmailTemplate.description: YP email after completing eoi but haven't gone on to sign up (2 days after EOI)
EmailTemplate.name: 2. YP email low priority EOI
EmailTemplate.subject: A little nudge from NCS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Start your NCS journey
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
You’re just a few steps away from signing up to NCS - an amazing, life-changing experience.
But don’t just take our word for it - take the plunge and check out this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YEpX7Q2-CVQ
You can kick-start your application using your unique NCS ID to log in: {!Contact.NCS_ID__c}
For more info, click on the link below: http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/programme/
Or, Sign Up Now! https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
Copyright © 2016 The Challenge Network, All rights reserved. The Challenge Network is a charity registered in England and Wales with charity no. 1129239 and company no. 6845451, whose registered office is at Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, London SE1 7NQ.
You are receiving this email because you have registered your interest for NCS. Want to update your preferences or unsubscribe? Please email us at contact@ncsthechallenge.org or call us on 0203 542 2400.
